text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Mumuu~…mumumuu~…
While I was in the middle of shopping, I found Taiki Shuttle crouched in the middle of the road…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh! Trainer-san, howdy~! I'm fine, I'm fine, I got a good picture!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: The best shot of this manhole! The angle is important in photos, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! Japan's manhole covers have a bunch of unique designs. If I share them, my family will probably be happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fufu~! The truth is, yesterday I was talking with my family and they said [We want to see the city you live in].

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why I'm looking for some nice photo spots! That said~…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, let's go look together!
choice_data_list: I was going to go shopping though…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh… even though we just met by coincidence, that makes me a little lonely…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Shopping… can't we just do that some other time? That's fine! C'mon, let's do that!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! That makes me really happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: If we get a lot, my family will definitely be happy. To Japan's nice spots, here we go!
And so it was decided, I would be accompanying the high-spirited Taiki Shuttle…
(pashaa! pashaa!)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Great! Japan's vending machines are really incredible. Not just drinks, there's even food.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oden, udon, ramen… there's alot!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …Oh, but I haven't seen any sushi. Even though it's the top soul food.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Have we just not found one yet? Trainer-san, if you find one, let me know!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh! Those look like photo booths! THIS is Japanese pop culture!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: It's exciting, isn't it?! Trainer-san, let's go in!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Let's match up with the countdown! Three, two-… one-
(pashaa!)
From the dispenser, Taiki Shuttle's photo came out. It was filled with filters and seals that she had chosen.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ahahahahahaa! Trainer-san, you were hiding behind me!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: But it's still cool! These seals, I need to share them with my family!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Mmmmm~! It was really lucky that we found a taiyaki stall!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Make sure you hold on to that taiyaki for me. I need to get a picture of it!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Sniff sniff. …Haa~~, it seems like it'll be really delicious.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hot and fresh… and, that crunchy-looking tail. I want to eat it as soon as I can…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Uuu, I-I need to properly get a photo of it! Wait for it… just wait…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …drool.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Uuuuu~~! Trainer-san! Can you stand a little further away please?!
After that, Taiki Shuttle and I went non-stop to several different places-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Good! THIS is the Japanese aethestic - like wasabi!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: It'd be nice if there was a samurai… Oh, yes! Next, let's get a picture of a samurai!
choice_data_list: The sun's going to set soon though?
The sun's going to set soon though?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's already this late… I guess it can't be helped. Let's make our way back, lickety split!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fufu! I got a lot of wonderful shots. With this much, it should be… Ah!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Stooooooooop!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I forgot a really important shot! Trainer-san, please!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: C'mon, c'mon, over here.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'm taking it~!
(pashaa!)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! I got a nice 2-shot!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …Fufuu. I've been thinking this for a while now. Trainer-san, I should introduce you to my family.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: You're always there by my side cheering me on… Trainer-san is an important person to me.
choice_data_list: I'm happy you feel that way

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh! E-ehehe. Me too… I'm very happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: They're all nice shots but, this one is the one I like the most.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, thank you very much for today. Let's go look for more nice spots in Japan again sometime!
…Several days later, I received a mail titled [American pop culture!] from America.
Attached was a photo of a fun-looking barbeque with a younger Taiki Shuttle and her family-
Written in hiragana was a short message, [Thanks for taking care of our daughter!].
